intro: This document provides a comprehensive description of the European Ground Motion Service (EGMS) products, which are part of the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service. It details the specifications, formats, attribute tables, and metadata associated with the EGMS Basic, Calibrated, and Ortho products. The document focuses on enabling users to fully understand and effectively utilise the InSAR-derived ground motion data, including product map projections, file naming conventions, and ancillary datasets used in EGMS production.
